borrowOrTradeFromPool(bytes32,bytes32,bo.details: Note: Only callable by loan pools (iTokens). Wrapper to _borrowOrTrade internal function.

params.isTorqueLoan: Whether the loan is a Torque loan.
params.loanDataBytes: The payload for the call. These loan DataBytes are  additional loan data (not in use for token swaps).
params.loanId: The ID of the loan. If 0, start a new loan.
params.loanParamsId: The ID of the loan parameters.
params.sentAddresses: The addresses to send tokens: lender, borrower,  receiver and manager:    lender: must match loan if loanId provided.    borrower: must match loan if loanId provided.    receiver: receiver of funds (address(0) assumes borrower address).    manager: delegated manager of loan unless address(0).
params.sentValues: The values to send:    interestRate: New loan interest rate.    newPrincipal: New loan size (borrowAmount + any borrowed interest).    interestInitialAmount: New amount of interest to escrow for Torque loan (determines initial loan length).    loanTokenReceived: Total loanToken deposit (amount not sent to borrower in the case of Torque loans).    collateralTokenSent: Total collateralToken deposit.    minEntryPrice: Minimum entry price for checking price divergence (Value of loan token in collateral).

borrowOrTradeFromPool(bytes32,bytes32,bo.return: newPrincipal The new loan size.newCollateral The new collateral amount.

getBorrowAmount(address,address,uint256,.details: Basically borrowAmount = collateral / marginAmount     * Collateral is something that helps secure a loan. When you borrow money, you agree that your lender can take something and sell it to get their money back if you fail to repay the loan. That's the collateral.

params.isTorqueLoan: Whether the loan is a Torque loan.
params.marginAmount: The amount of margin of the trade.

params.collateralTokenSent: The amount of collateral tokens sent.
params.interestRate: The interest rate. Percentage w/ 18 decimals.
params.loanTokenSent: The amount of loan tokens sent.
params.newPrincipal: The updated amount of principal (current debt).

params.isTorqueLoan: Whether the loan is a Torque loan.
params.marginAmount: The amount of margin of the trade.
params.newPrincipal: The updated amount of principal (current debt).

params.target: The address of the target contract.

isOwner().details: Returns true if the caller is the current owner.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params.delegated: The address of the delegated manager.
params.loanId: The ID of the loan. If 0, start a new loan.
params.toggle: The flag true/false for the delegated manager.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

getBorrowAmount(address,address,uint256,.notice: Get the borrow amount of a trade loan.

getEstimatedMarginExposure(address,addre.notice: Get the estimated margin exposure.     * Margin is the money borrowed from a broker to purchase an investment and is the difference between the total value of investment and the loan amount. Margin trading refers to the practice of using borrowed funds from a broker to trade a financial asset, which forms the collateral for the loan from the broker.

initialize(address).notice: Set function selectors on target contract.

userdoc.notice: This contract code comes from bZx. bZx is a protocol for tokenized margin trading and lending https://bzx.network similar to the dYdX protocol. * This contract contains functions to borrow and trade.
